title: Concerns for Buffalo? Are Ravens the best AFC team? Secrets in the locker room; David Baker; Power Rankings
itunes:title: Concerns for Buffalo? Are Ravens the best AFC team? Secrets in the locker room; David Baker; Power Rankings
description:
In the latest edition of the Good Morning Football Podcast, hosts Kay Adams, Kyle Brandt, Peter Schrager, and Cris Carter react to the thrilling Monday Night Football game between the Buffalo Bills and Tennessee Titans; then the crew discusses who they think is the best AFC team; Cris Carter shares his thoughts on the trust and secrets in the locker room between players and coaches; and lastly, they're joined by David Baker, who shares why he's retired as President of the Pro Football Hall of Fame.

The Good Morning Football Podcast is part of the NFL Podcast Network.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
